channel.title: Bash on Luca's Trove
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on Luca's Trove

item.title: FOSSEE
item.description: I had the wonderful opportunity to intern at IIT Bombay to help develop the Image Processing Toolbox for Scilab, a free software developed by French company Scilab Enterprises. I got this opportunity as a member of FOSSEE (Free Open Source Software For Education), an initiative by IIT Bombay to make available open source equivalents of proprietary academic software.
